post.body: For the first time?! Are you serious? Oh man, let me know what you think in the end.
You shoot bad guys too?!
Combat Arms. http://combatarms.nexon.net/ It's a free game, but they try to lure you buy better weapons and armor and such.
That's the most wonderful letter I've read, ever.
Thought that just occurred to me: "The best things in life are free. Such as stolen goods." ...cuz, you know, you only steal the best.
This HARDLY belongs in the "CRIME" section of CNN -- http://www.cnn.com/2008/CRIME/12/27/movie.shooting/index.html.
Met some Mexican LDS guys playing Combat Arms online. We shot each other many times, merrily.
It's CRAZY how many that site shows in my zip code's vicinity. And I'd never heard of it.
or else the straight-up GPS coordinates, then people go looking for it. When they find it, they leave it there, but sign a little logbook.
Has anybody here heard of geocaching? (www.geocaching.com) Basically, it's a community for "treasure hunts" - you hide something, post clues
Christmas was a success. We woke up, read some of Luke 2, opened stockings, ate cinnamon rolls, opened presents, saw family, and I gamed.
I took our 2 yr-old to the ER tonight for a nasty head bonk. She was fine, but I think she was naughty to scare us. So, she gets coal now.
Christmas is RUINED! They didn't call back to seal the deal for real. Banana peel. Queel.
Got a long-awaited call from a company interested in buying Singlesaints, and they want to seal the deal tonight. It's a Christmas Miracle!
Weird. How do I manage to forget lunch AND dinner? .......maybe it's time to turn off the video games.
Just found out my bro-in-law needs ride to airport. If I die, I leave you this mysterious riddle: What walks on 4 legs in oh crap char limit
Product Mgmt just served us all breakfast. Bacon, eggs, french toast... have I ever told you, Food, how much I love you? I do. I truly do.
Rebecca invented chocolates -- with chewy brownie centers. Estimated time to millionaire status: 6 months. (They also have nicotine in 'em.)
What if you could combine the pleasures of naps and brownies into one uber-pleasure? And only you could make it. You'd be RICH, I tells ya.
I don't WANT to waste the whole day -- I like being productive. But I also like relaxing and not expending effort and eating junk food.
